title: Obama Continues Push for College Promise Plan
text:
15 Obama Continues Push for College Promise Plan 
Education News: President Barack Obama made a trip to Michigan in an effort to create a renewed push for free community college, as well as an increase of on-the-job training, all as part of the new College Promise campaign.
